3.0.name: wordpress/private-community-for-bp-lite
3.0.description:
Makes BP pages private and only accessable to logged in users with the exception of the pages you set in Dashboard/Settings/PrivateCommunityBP. The Lite version only allows 6 unblocked pages and does not currently support multisite installations. Blocks RSS feeds as well.

Premium version with more options coming soon.
